promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic strong lynx fire-type wearing a fiery crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Fyrestone, a gigantic strong lynx fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: sizzly-slide, lock-on. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word lynx or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, lynx-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Fyrestone is a strong-willed giant that prowls desert lands. Its agility lets it outwit foes and its sizzly-slide adds extra oomph! Lock-on me...
